name: Fresh Breath Spray (2 Pack), Mouth Moisturizer for Dry Mouth, Long Lasting Mint Flavor, 1.69 oz Travel Size, Alcohol-Free & Sugar Free, Natural Ingredients for Bad Breath Instant Fresh
short_description: Instant Fresh Breath & Long-Lasting Protection: SmileShark mouth freshener spray provides instant freshness to combat bad breath, leaving your mouth feeling clean and revitalized. The advanced formula neutralizes odors at the source, ensuring long-lasting minty freshness. Perfect for use after meals, before meetings, or anytime you need a quick refresh. Unlike other sprays that only mask odors, SmileShark targets the root cause of bad breath for a truly effective solution.

Moisturizes & Soothes Dry Mouth: Dry mouth can be uncomfortable and lead to bad breath. SmileShark dry mouth spray contains natural moisturizing agents like xylitol and aloe vera to hydrate and soothe irritated oral tissues. Ideal for those with dry mouth due to medications, aging, or dehydration, this spray provides immediate relief while promoting saliva production for lasting comfort.

Alcohol-Free & Sugar-Free for Gentle Care: Unlike harsh breath sprays with alcohol that can burn or dry out your mouth, SmileShark oral spray is alcohol-free and sugar-free, making it gentle yet effective. Safe for daily use, it won’t damage tooth enamel or irritate sensitive mouths. The natural peppermint flavor delivers a refreshing burst without any artificial aftertaste.

Compact & Travel-Friendly Design: The 1.52 oz bottle fits perfectly in your pocket, purse, or gym bag, so you can stay fresh on the go. The leak-proof design ensures no spills, making it ideal for travel, work, or outdoor activities. Keep one at home, in the car, and at the office for instant freshness whenever you need it.

Natural Ingredients for a Healthier Mouth: SmileShark is made with high-quality, natural ingredients like peppermint oil, spearmint, and xylitol to freshen breath while supporting oral health. Free from artificial colors, flavors, and preservatives, it’s a safe choice for the whole family.

product_description:
Experience instant fresh breath and oral care with Listerine Cool Mint PocketPaks breath strips, the portable solution designed to kill 99% of bad breath germs. These sugar free and kosher breath strips dissolve instantly on your tongue, releasing a Cool Mint flavor that leaves your mouth clean* *based on bad breath germs and confident.  Key Benefits: 
 Listerine PocketPaks breath strips are a convenient alternative to breath mints, breath spray, or travel size mouthwash, offering discreet, no-chew, no-rinse oral freshness wherever you are. The compact carrying case keeps each strip ready for use, ensuring you can easily slip a pack into your purse, pocket, or bag for daily routines, travel, or special occasions. 
 
 How to use: 
 To use, simply remove one strip from the case, place it on your tongue, and let it dissolve for fast Cool Mint freshness. Designed for adults seeking effective bad breath treatment, these dissolving strips provide a portable, easy-to-carry option for maintaining fresh breath and oral care throughout the day. Whether you need a quick refresh after meals, before important meetings, or while traveling, Listerine Cool Mint PocketPaks breath strips deliver bad breath germ-killing performance and a burst of minty flavor in a discreet, travel-friendly format.
